segments.text: Ten sheets of rice paper , 25 brushes , two boxes of oil color and two boxes of water color . All these come up to $ 35.50 , sir .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok , here is $ 50 . Oh , can you make out an invoice for me ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure , just a minute . Are you an artist , sir ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I am a teacher . I teach art .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That must be a very interesting job .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It is . You must be new here . I do my shopping here regularly , once a week .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you ? Nice to meet you ! And here is the invoice and your change .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . Nice to meet you , too .
segments.speaker: S2
